name: windy city cowl
notes:
this customizable cowl features a beautiful striped design with and a close fit, making it a versatile and cozy addition to any wardrobe. right and left-handed video tutorials and written instructions make this beginner-friendly. crafted with caron's simply me bulky weight yarn, this cowl is both cozy and fashionable - and quick to crochet!
  
**unique features-**
  
• beginner-friendly crochet pattern
• stylish striped design with a cozy fit
• includes video tutorials for easy crafting
  
  
**materials needed-**
  
• us-l, 8.0mm hook, [**furls**](https://tidd.ly/4l6y8yy)
• 246 yds [**caron simply me**](https://amzn.to/4mrg8nl) (5 - bulky; 62% acrylic, 20% nylon, 18% wool; 200g/7oz, 225 m/246 yds)
• [**stitch markers**](https://amzn.to/4jyp8v0)
